author: Ben Reed
description: A tangy cocktail that's reminiscent of a cinnamon laced apple pie. Shame it's not blue.
name: Azure Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
